mapper.select:
select
,p.kind as p_kind, p.uid as p_uid, p.name as p_name, p.postage as p_postage, p.status as p_status, p.onshelf as p_onshelf from td_product_sku s left join td_product p on s.product_id = p.id where s.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
